No problems about the delays, it happens to us all :-)

As for who your cha=
racters recognize I will leave up to you. The ways I've seen it done are 1 =
- Your characters know 

nearly nothing and have no attachments to anyone. =
2 - Your characters have been preprogramed with some history and depending =
on which faction you into first decidedes who you belong to. Or 3 - your ch=
aracters have a complete history, knowledge and background already. 

Your =
characters seem to be partially using option 3, although it's up to you how=
 it can play out. Perhaps your onboard sensor can detect Maximal and Predic=
on energy signatures? Autobot/Decepticon signatures should be close enough =
to their counterparts if you wish to use that.

As for history? Maximals an=
d Predicons generally know about the G1/G2 Autobots and Decepticons, and in=
 many places it is generally assumed that a few Autobots and Decepticons co=
nverted into the newer BW type over time. IE Ravage did in the 'toon. Howev=
er if you are playing characters w/o history knowledge, then you can forget=
 about what I just wrote and play how you feel comfortable :-)

If I can he=
lp in any way let me know :-) 

I hope to be ending the battle soon. I had =
orginally planned to use the battle to close a few story arcs, so if we can=
 get a few more posts in I can close them.

Preston
